name: A Good Ending
description:
A little game i made for the BlackThornProd udemy course!

With a few extra touches ;) (I'm not very good at art alright)

(Ignore the mac icon i don't know why it did that)

For mac: Simply download the game and then click on it and press play

For Windows: Download the game, Extract the files, Open "Udemy Game" and press play.
